name: Drawing Connections between Models
description:
This is another main point of my tool.
Let's say we learn math, and we learn how to do a distance formula.
We do it the hard way by adding/multiplying/powers by hand, but we write a Math library, or just learn of it's existence.

Then we have lm-wumpus with agent location, room location, and room size. We want to know if an agent is in a room.

How do we learn that the position of the agent acts like x-y cartesian coordinates? That we can use math against them to improve our sensor.

I mean, "do science during meditation" is what I'm looking for, but that's an abstract how and when. I need something more concrete.
